snippet: If Andrea Stramaccioni was in any doubt as to how his new position as Inter's coach would require him to deal with the extraordinary on a regular basis, he certainly isn't now.
abstract: If Andrea Stramaccioni was in any doubt as to how his new position as Inter's coach would require him to deal with the extraordinary on a regular basis, he certainly isn't now.

headline.main: Have Moratti and Inter Found Something Special Again?
